Key.Original: All vehicles have been deployed already
Key.English: All vehicles have been deployed already

Key.Original: [['No suitable position was found!'],['try to move vehicles/boxes out of the way']]
Key.English: [['No suitable position was found!'],['try to move vehicles/boxes out of the way']]

Key.Original: Given customPos need to be marker, object or position
Key.English: Given customPos need to be marker, object or position

Key.Original: Given string is not a marker!\nit needs to be marker, object or position
Key.English: Given string is not a marker!\nit needs to be marker, object or position

Key.Original: Given array needs to be in format PositionAGL or Position2D
Key.English: Given array needs to be in format PositionAGL or Position2D

Key.Original: Object is not defined or doesn't exist
Key.English: Object is not defined or doesn't exist

Key.Original: Setting is not enabled from CBA settings
Key.English: Setting is not enabled from CBA settings

Key.Original: Should the actions be hidden when all vehicles/containers have been spawned
Key.English: Should the actions be hidden when all vehicles/containers have been spawned

Key.Original: How can access the spawn actions. If synchronized objects are used, synchronize the players with the main NL module. Regardless of the setting, everyone is still able to switch their loadout freely.
Key.English: How can access the spawn actions. If synchronized objects are used, synchronize the players with the main NL module. Regardless of the setting, everyone is still able to switch their loadout freely.

Key.Original: Is vehicle amount global for every object (for side), or are they local only to the object that they are added to
Key.English: Is vehicle amount global for every object (for side), or are they local only to the object that they are added to

Key.Original: How frequently should the function search for nearby vehicles
Key.English: How frequently should the function search for nearby vehicles

Key.Original: What's the maximum distance where vehicle can be from the object
Key.English: What's the maximum distance where vehicle can be from the object

Key.Original: What's the maximum distance where vehicle can be from the object to rearm
Key.English: What's the maximum distance where vehicle can be from the object to rearm

Key.Original: Which side can access the actions
Key.English: Which side can access the actions

Key.Original: Name of the object(s), to whom the actions will be attached to (separate multiple objects with comma sign)
Key.English: Name of the object(s), to whom the actions will be attached to (separate multiple objects with comma sign)

Key.Original: Add spawn menu to designated object(s) specified in the module.
Key.English: Add spawn menu to designated object(s) specified in the module.

Key.Original: Classname of the vehicle, without quotation marks
Key.English: Classname of the vehicle, without quotation marks

Key.Original: Custom name for the vehicle, without quotation marks (OPTIONAL)
Key.English: Custom name for the vehicle, without quotation marks (OPTIONAL)

Key.Original: Amount of vehicles that can be spawned (-1 for infinite)
Key.English: Amount of vehicles that can be spawned (-1 for infinite)

Key.Original: Array containing custom position(s) to spawn the vehicle (OPTIONAL)
Key.English: Array containing custom position(s) to spawn the vehicle (OPTIONAL)

Key.Original: Name of the gear that will be searched from the Tuntematon Geariscript function
Key.English: Name of the gear that will be searched from the Tuntematon Geariscript function

Key.Original: Add vehicle to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.
Key.English: Add vehicle to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.

Key.Original: Classname of the container, without quotation marks
Key.English: Classname of the container, without quotation marks

Key.Original: Custom name for the container, without quotation marks
Key.English: Custom name for the container, without quotation marks

Key.Original: Amount of containers that can be spawned (-1 for infinite)
Key.English: Amount of containers that can be spawned (-1 for infinite)

Key.Original: Name of the gear that will be searched from the Tuntematon Geariscript function
Key.English: Name of the gear that will be searched from the Tuntematon Geariscript function

Key.Original: Add supply box to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.
Key.English: Add supply box to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.

Key.Original: Name that will be shown in the action, without quotation marks
Key.English: Name that will be shown in the action, without quotation marks

Key.Original: Custom to be executed when action is used. Params passed to code [_object, _player], where _object references to the object action is attaced to.
Key.English: Custom to be executed when action is used. Params passed to code [_object, _player], where _object references to the object action is attaced to.

Key.Original: Add loadout to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.
Key.English: Add loadout to the spawn manu, must be synced with the module you wish to add the vehicles with. Can be synced with multiple modules.

Key.Original: Name of the object(s), to whom the actions will be attached to (separate multiple objects with comma sign)
Key.English: Name of the object(s), to whom the actions will be attached to (separate multiple objects with comma sign)

Key.Original: Create marker to object designated as rearm depot
Key.English: Create marker to object designated as rearm depot

Key.Original: Add adility to rearm vehicle at designated object(s), this will rearm the vehicle ammo count to the ammount that the vehicles class started with.
Key.English: Add adility to rearm vehicle at designated object(s), this will rearm the vehicle ammo count to the ammount that the vehicles class started with.
